quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: They told me before that all my evidence had been passed over, but now it’s like they’ve never seen it.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: Yes, the SASH did record that everything had been given, but later it seems the police couldn’t locate it.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: So which one is true? Either it was passed or it wasn’t.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: That’s why I asked them to confirm receipt, but they haven’t responded yet.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: It feels like they’re playing games with my safety.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I understand, Ben. I’ll keep pushing them to clarify.

contradictions.issue: SASH record 'all evidence passed to police' vs later police 'cannot locate evidence'
